snippet.textDisplay: Played this song in my head while taking the PSAT's today. Let's just say that it made for a pretty epic experience.

snippet.textDisplay: My party for this one was: MC w/Debilitate, Chakra Ring, Auto-Mataru Auto-Masuku, Kanji w/Rudra Ring + Primal Force SPAM, Naoto w/Megidolaon  SPAM!! MOAR SPAM and Yukiko w/Chakra Ring and Salvation every 3 turns ;D
snippet.textOriginal: My party for this one was: MC w/Debilitate, Chakra Ring, Auto-Mataru Auto-Masuku, Kanji w/Rudra Ring + Primal Force SPAM, Naoto w/Megidolaon  SPAM!! MOAR SPAM and Yukiko w/Chakra Ring and Salvation every 3 turns ;D

snippet.textDisplay: I agree with you for the most part. And seriously... I feel like ATLUS CARES about their fans. Releasing almost all their games here, if not all. Fan-service for the new games too! :D

This is my new favorite BGM. For many years it was chrono cross with scars of time.

This track is just so calming yet exciting. It brings about so many emotions it really does feel like it sums up the game all in one song.

Gotta agree with Hernesoppa, I love FF and KH and Chrono Trigger and loads of RPGs, but Persona 4 is easily the top. And this is easily my favourite game music ever.
So I reccommend everyone give it a chance atleast once if you've ever liked RPGs.

Dunno about supra, but I'd rank this the best RPG I've ever played. Hands down.

And mind you, I love the hell out of FFX, Kingdom Hearts and the like.
